name: La Sportiva Mythos 30th Anniversary Rock Shoes - Unisex
description: After 30 years of sending, the Mythos might be one of the most successful climbing shoe ever made. A staple for crack and slab climbing, the anniversary version of the Mythos has been updated with a new rubber compound and old-school purple colour. Unlined suede upper moulds to the shape of your foot and a wrap-around lacing system provides a fine-tuned fit for your forefoot and heel. This version also features laces and webbing made from recycled fishing nets and leather that isn't processed with heavy metals.Uppers are biodegradable leather made using a metal-free tanning process.Laces and webbing are made from recycled fishing nets.Constructed using water-based adhesives.1.1mm Laspoflex midsoles are moderately stiff for good edging, yet supple enough to allow smearing.Grippy 4mm FriXion XF 2.0 rubber is super sticky.La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size.
